Added styling to make the Airtel logo visible. The SVG has a wide aspect ratio (about 6.5:1), so it was constrained by the 120px max-width. Updated the CSS and added a specific width for the Airtel logo container.

The logo should now be visible. If it still isn't, possible causes:
1. The SVG file path/import
2. Browser caching

Try a hard refresh (Ctrl+F5) or clear the browser cache. The logo should display with the updated styling.

Updated the quick metrics section to center the numbers with their descriptions.

1. Changed `align-items: flex-start;` to `align-items: center;` to center the flex items horizontally
2. Added `text-align: center;` to center the text content

The numbers (100K+, 99.9%, 10+, RBI + NCMC) are now centered above their descriptions. No linting errors.
